loadOptimizations.details: Image uses lazy loading, proper width/height attributes (240x240), and optimized PNG format (2.3MB, 1024x1536)

buildPerformance.details: Build successful in 1.39s, code splitting implemented, lazy loading for AnimatedBlobs

issues: Image file size could be optimized (2.3MB is large for hero image)
